text: (Kumbuchilani) katema kaŵaŵechete ŵankwao Imrani (ŵali mamaŵao Maryam jwali mamagwe Isa) kuti: “Ambuje ŵangu! Chisimu une nantaŵiile nasili janti; (mwanache) jwali nchitumbo changuchi chachiŵa pepesa (lyakutumichila kunsikiti wa Baitul Muqaddas) basi mbochelani (nasili janguji), chisimu Mmwejo niŵan'di Ŵakupikanichisya, Ŵakumanyilila nnope.”
